page.title: 14Painthorpe First School
page.content: Painthorpe school was opened on January 7th 1876 by John Mackie.When the school first opened the age grouping was 5 to 12. Before they left for Dane Royd it was 5 to 9. Mr.Witingstone was the first head master at Painthorpe from 1876 to 1914, he had 161 children and 2 teachers.In 1984 the school had the smallest number of children with 92 on roll. In contrast in 1976 they had the largest number of children with 188 on roll. Painthorpe had six teachers with five classes,before they left for Dane Royd.
